title: Handle Driver Deactivation for Safety Violation
description: A driver's background check re-run reveals a new, serious criminal conviction. Their account must be immediately deactivated.

tasks.description: The system receives results from a continuous background check, flagging a driver for a disqualifying offense.
tasks.expected_outcome: A high-priority alert is sent to the safety team.

tasks.description: A safety agent reviews the report and confirms the offense violates the platform's safety standards.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent validates the reason for deactivation.

tasks.description: The agent immediately and permanently deactivates the driver's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver's access to the platform is revoked.

tasks.description: Send a formal notification to the driver informing them of the deactivation, citing the safety policy violation.
